body:
Yo AMA time

don't ask why
wait nevermind do!

title: AMA cuz why not

replies.body:
1. Why did you do dis?
2. Do you like Penut Butter?
3. Do you like Jam
4. If you like Penut Butter or Jam Do you Like it with toast
5. If you like toast say in a descriptive phrase/paragraph why you like toast
6. I LOVE TOAST
7. #TOASTFTW

replies.body:
1. Because everyone else was doing it
2. DUH
3. Depends what kind
4. Yeah, unless it's cinnamon raisin toast, in which case it needs to have butter or be plain
5. Toast = good. Descriptive enough for ya?
6. YAY ME TOO
7. #TRUTH
